title: Kento Isomura
text:
Kento Isomura

A student majoring in Economics at Kyoto University, Japan

##Kento Isomura

My name is Kento Isomura, and I am an undergraduate student at Kyoto University, majoring in economics. My primary research interests lie in urban economics, spatial analysis, and the economics of crime, with a particular focus on the relationship between urban environments and social outcomes. In addition to my academic pursuits, I have a strong interest in architecture and urban design, and I enjoy exploring modern cities and their cultural landscapes. I am always open to engaging in thoughtful discussions and collaborations related to urban studies and economics.
